On any other torrent site ANY user, blatantly or not, for even slightest attempt to "lead" people to actually buy disks or tickets - would be banned.

I agree with Adapa, not completely, in his answer:

"We can't stop it, only you can, by starving them of the attention they are seeking. Ignore them and they'll get bored and go away."

Only thing I disagree with is that he would not go away. If they don't get attention - they resort to increase of frequency of venting out and heighten insults level.

Only time when they were stopped is when they were banned and comments were erased, as never existed. Some loonies come back, some not - but they ALL re-think their approach. 

People must feel the consequences of being evil - otherwise they would never change.

Ostrich-strategy is WORST strategy possible.
